text: James Timothy "Jim" Haggarty (April 14, 1914 in Port Arthur, Ontario â€“ March 8, 1998) was a Canadian ice hockey player who competed in the 1936 Winter Olympics. In 1936 he was a member of the Canadian ice hockey team, which won the silver medal. He later played 5 games in the National Hockey League for the Montreal Canadiens. ==Other websites== * *James Haggarty's profile at Hockey Reference.com *James Haggarty's profile at Hockey Reference.com *James Haggarty's profile at Sports Reference.com Category:1914 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey forwards Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay
title: James Haggarty
